message: KendoUI core is free and open source now!
name: Announcing Kendo UI Core

description: Announcing Kendo UI CoreGo comment! Wednesday, April 16, 2014 by Kendo UIOn behalf of the Kendo UI team, I am tremendously excited to announce Kendo UI Core, a free and open-source distribution of Kendo UI (released under the Apache License, version 2.0).
